TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XamlTypeMapper extends System.Object

summary.span: 將 XAML 項目名稱對應至組件中適當的 CLR 。

span.span: Maps a XAML element name to the appropriate CLR in assemblies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬於進階 WPF 的案例中，提供替代內容和。 is part of an advanced WPF scenario that supplies alternate context for and . 如[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]WPF 應用程式，您應該考慮覆寫此案例中，而不是嘗試使用。For [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] WPF applications, you should consider overriding for this scenario, rather than attempting to use . 可用來提供更直接的技術的應用程式比透過自訂的對應資訊的 XAML 剖析器組譯程式碼的值。 can be used to provide the XAML parser with custom mapping information through a more direct technique than the application of values on the assembly code. 這可能是適用於組件中的所有 CLR 命名空間的彙總或參考型別，是為了增加而不必重新編譯時的現有組件中的 XAML 已備妥屬性設定。This might be useful for consolidation of all CLR namespaces in an assembly, or for referencing types that are XAML-ready in an existing assembly without having to recompile it just to add attributing. 您通常會建立執行個體，以指定屬性值。You typically create a instance in order to specify the property value for a . 依次可用做為環境呼叫。The in turn can be used as the context for a call. ## 預設對應工具Default Mapper 您可以使用預設對應程式來取得靜態屬性。You can obtain a default mapper using the static property. 預設對應工具只適用於預設組件清單。The default mapper only works on a default assembly list. 沒有組件的特定資訊 (如中所指定建構函式) 會使用。No specific information about assemblies (as is specified in constructors) is used.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 定義 XML 命名空間和組件中 CLR 命名空間之間的對應，並且將這些對應加入至 資訊。

span.span: Defines a mapping between an XML namespace and CLR namespaces in assemblies, and adds these to the information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是程式設計方式來新增對應。 is a programmatic way to add a mapping. 下列 XAML 對應指令的不同部分，例如對應至參數的:For example, the different parts of the following XAML mapping instruction correspond to the parameters of the : ``` ... ``` `xmlNamespace`是`SDK`、`clrNamespace`是`Samples`，而`assemblyName`是`SDKSamples`。The `xmlNamespace` is `SDK`, the `clrNamespace` is `Samples`, and the `assemblyName` is `SDKSamples`.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual bool AllowInternalType (Type type);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool AllowInternalType(class System.Type type) cil managed
protected: virtual bool AllowInternalType(Type ^ type);

span.span: The type to access.

summary.span: 要求 衍生型別的使用權限，以便在完全信任的情況下呼叫此型別來存取特定內部型別。

span.span: Requests permission for a derived type that is called under full trust to access a specific internal type.

returns.span: 如果可以存取內部型別則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the internal type can be accessed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未由子類別，覆寫一律會傳回`false`。If not overridden by a subclass, always returns `false`. 覆寫時由子類別，行為應該是應該傳回`true`內部型別可存取; 否則如果`false`。When overridden by a subclass, the behavior should be that should return `true` if the internal type can be accessed; otherwise, `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper DefaultMapper { get; }
.property class System.Windows.Markup.XamlTypeMapper DefaultMapper
Public Shared ReadOnly Property DefaultMapper As XamlTypeMapper
public: static property System::Windows::Markup::XamlTypeMapper ^ DefaultMapper { System::Windows::Markup::XamlTypeMapper ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 的執行個體，如果尚未指定執行個體，則使用該執行個體。

span.span: Gets an instance of the to use if one has not been specified.
The default type mapper.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設對應工具只適用於預設組件清單。The default mapper only works on a default assembly list. 沒有組件的特定資訊 (如中所指定建構函式) 會使用。No specific information about assemblies (as is specified in constructors) is used. 在目前的實作是預設組件清單： `WindowsBase`， `PresentationCore`， `PresentationFramework`。In the current implementation the default assembly list is: `WindowsBase`, `PresentationCore`, `PresentationFramework`. 使用預設對應工具並不表示您無法使用自訂的組件類型在 XAML 中完全。Using the default mapper does not mean that you cannot use custom assemblies/types in XAML at all. 它僅表示如果您使用自訂類型/組件，您必須再使用傳統的 XAML 技巧，建立做為對應的`xmlns`每個類型/組件所參考位置，而不是型別對應器應用程式開發介面的 XAML 頁面中的屬性。It only means that if you do use custom types/assemblies, you must then use the conventional XAML technique of creating the mappings as `xmlns` attributes in each XAML page where the types/assemblies are referenced, as opposed to a type mapper API. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XAML 命名空間和 WPF XAML 命名空間對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For more information, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public Type GetType (string xmlNamespace, string localName);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Type GetType(string xmlNamespace, string localName) cil managed
Public Function GetType (xmlNamespace As String, localName As String) As Type
public: Type ^ GetType(System::String ^ xmlNamespace, System::String ^ localName);

param.name: xmlNamespace
param.span: 指定的 XML 命名空間前置詞。

span.span: The specified XML namespace prefix.

param.name: localName
param.span: 用來取得所對應 之 XAML 項目的「本機」名稱。

span.span: The "local" name of the XAML element to obtain the mapped for.

param.span: 這裡所指的本機意謂對應時相對於已提供的 xmlNamespace。

span.span: Local in this context means as mapped versus the provided xmlNamespace.

summary.span: 使用指定的 XML 命名空間前置詞和項目名稱，取得指定的 XAML 項目所對應的 CLR 。

span.span: Gets the CLR that a given XAML element is mapped to, using the specified XML namespace prefix and element name.

returns.span: 物件的 ，如果無法解析對應則為 。

span.span: The for the object, or if no mapping could be resolved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果型別無法對應至提供的資訊，找到`null`傳回。If a type cannot be found that maps to the provided information, `null` is returned. 一部分，不包含前置詞`localName`。Do not include the prefix as part of `localName`. 針對任何前置 XAML 項目資訊時，區隔到`xmlNamespace`和`localName`此應用程式開發介面呼叫的元件。For any prefixed XAML element information, separate it into `xmlNamespace` and `localName` components for this API call.
